Title: Add PR template with quick review checklist

Description:
Create a `.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md` file that includes the lightweight PR checklist from `CODING_STANDARDS.md` so contributors are prompted to run tests and include necessary details.

Acceptance Criteria:
- `.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md` created with checklist and brief instructions.
- Template includes checkboxes for: build, tests, create/update/get tests, and secrets check.
- Team members use the template when opening PRs.

Owner: Both
Estimate: 1 day
